# Min Int8

> Minimum signed 8-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var INT8_MIN = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-min' );
```

#### INT8_MIN

Minimum signed 8-bit integer.

``` javascript
INT8_MIN === -128;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var INT8_MIN = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-min' );

console.log( INT8_MIN );
// => -128
```

</section>
